metadata.name: Aghazadeh house
metadata.description: Aghazadeh house is one of the tourist attractions of Abarkouh, which was built during the Qajar era and is still one of the most beautiful historical houses in Abarkouh. The windshield of this house with a height of 18 meters is the only two-story windshield in Yazd province. Because of the beauty and pleasantness of this house, I decided to design it with cubes
